title: Hashachen Bistro
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Sugar Cafe changed name to Hashachen Bistro in late-2014 and is now a neighborhood bistro-style restaurant with a bar and wine list (same management). Vegan choices are marked in every category with mains being hot tabbouleh or tofu curry; several vegan salads and breakfasts. Charges extra for soy milk in cappuccino. Free Wi-Fi. Jazz on some nights.
